EmailTemplate.description: PRO Template for Exchange - request to customer for approval of exchange
EmailTemplate.name: PRO Order Exchange Request Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Production Return Order: Exchange Approval {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We are working on your production return unit (Part number: {!Case.Product_Part__c} and Serial number: {!Case.Product_Serial_Number__c}) for your PO No.{!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}.
Please confirm if it is acceptable to exchange your returned unit with a new part if new material is available. This exchange approval will allow us to get you a new or reworked part with the least amount of delay.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
